function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Rapid sharing of information leading to quick action","Impact":"Rapid spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Verification and validation of shared information, coordination of response","Technologies":"Data validation tools, coordinated communication platforms","People":"Scientists, public health officials","Owner":"Global health organizations, research institutions"},{"Description":"Lack of collaborative strategies in smart cities","Impact":"Inefficient management of outbreaks, compromised public safety","Mitigation":"Collaborative planning, data sharing, early detection technologies","Technologies":"IoT sensors, thermal cameras, AI integration","People":"Smart city professionals, public health authorities","Owner":"City governments, technology firms"},{"Description":"Overreliance on thermal cameras for outbreak detection","Impact":"Ineffective detection of pandemics, false sense of security","Mitigation":"Integration with AI, validation through other methods","Technologies":"AI integration, validation tools","People":"Airport authorities, public health officials","Owner":"Government agencies, technology manufacturers"}]}
